entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:13 p.m. ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 p.m. ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baccaro Point 9:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: ENE 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain with risk of a thundershower. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending late in the evening then cloudy. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
